column4: How can I control which kernel grub chooses to boot in grub for ubuntu 10.10?
I'll never use it as a desktop again, sadly.

For me, it seemed like it was the end of the world. I hated it. Then I started using it, and I found out it was really good. It has problems here and there but I don't want to switch to anything else, so I got used to using it.
